Here is the simplified text, adapted for a learner of level B1:

Some time ago, a website warned people about sharing their whereabouts online. The site said that when you post where you are, you're also telling everyone else. This can be a problem because not everyone is someone you want to meet. This is one of the downsides of sharing everything online.

The internet has many great opportunities, but it also has its dangers. We can share our lives with the whole world, but we have to be careful. Some people have learned this the hard way. A long time ago, a group of pioneers started sharing their lives online. They got into trouble, lost friends, and even got fired from their jobs.

One of these pioneers was a student named Justin Hall. He started posting about his life on the internet in 1994. He shared everything, from his thoughts to his photos. He even wrote about his relationships and his feelings. But one day, he had to take down his website because his partner didn't like it. This is a problem that many people face today.

Another example is Heather Armstrong, a young woman who worked in a software company. She wrote about her job on her blog, but an anonymous colleague sent the link to her bosses. She got in trouble and lost her job. This is what can happen when we share too much online.

The article is saying that the internet is not a separate world where we can be ourselves without consequences. Our online lives are connected to our real lives, and we have to be careful about what we share. We can say anything online, but that doesn't mean we should.

Here is the simplified text, suitable for a learner of level B1:

Some scientists were worried about a low-budget film called What the Bleep Do We Know? It's a mix of documentary and drama that shows how little we know about the universe. Scientists can't know everything, but some were upset about the film. They thought it was misleading and didn't provide enough evidence for some of its claims. The film says that water molecules can change shape when people think about them. This sounds amazing, but the evidence shown in the film is just some pictures of ice crystals that look different depending on the mood of the person talking to them. Many people find this convincing, but scientists want more proof.

The truth is that scientists are still discovering many new things about the universe. They've found that the universe is made of a type of matter that we don't know much about, and it's being pushed by a mysterious force called "dark energy". On a smaller scale, scientists have found that our brains can't process events as they happen, and we only become aware of them a half-second later. They've also found where modern humans came from and why they left their home to populate the world. Some scientists even think that the design of the universe is connected to the existence of life on Earth.

Despite what some people think, science is still a long way from understanding everything. In fact, we're getting closer to realizing that many things can never be fully understood. This has led some scientists to try to create a single theory that explains everything in the universe. For many of us, the universe is just incredible.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text, adapted for a learner of level B1:

Writing novels is a big challenge, but writing short stories is a joy. It's like planting a forest versus a garden. Both are important and help me grow as a writer. When I finish a novel, I like to write some short stories. And when I finish a group of short stories, I want to write a novel. I never write short stories while writing a novel, and never write a novel while writing short stories. This helps me focus and makes my writing better. 

I started writing short stories in 1984. It was a new experience, but I enjoyed it. My first short story collection was called Tales from Abroad. I like writing short stories because they are quick to finish. It usually takes me a week to write a decent short story. This is different from writing a novel, which takes months or even years. Writing short stories is a change of pace and helps me stay fresh. I can write about small things, like an idea or an image, and see where it takes me. If the story doesn't work out, I don't worry. I can learn from my mistakes and use them in my next story. My short stories are like small footprints I leave behind. I remember where I wrote each one and how I felt. They are like guideposts to my heart, and I'm happy to share them with my readers.

Science is a complex subject that has both helped and harmed us. It has made our lives easier, but it has also caused problems. Scientists have tried to understand the world and the universe, but they still have a lot to learn. Sometimes, new discoveries replace old theories, and this can cause conflicts. Scientists are not always agreed on what they think they know. This book is about the ideas that have changed the way we think about science and the world. We will look at these ideas and consider their beauty and limitations. Science is always changing, and sometimes this leads to big changes in how we understand the world. Some people think that science is not good at explaining the world, but it has helped us make predictions and understand nature better. In the past, scientists thought they had already discovered everything, but then new discoveries were made. Today, scientists are working on a new theory that might explain everything. Science is important because it helps us control nature and make decisions about the future. We should pay attention to what scientists are doing because it affects our lives and the future of our planet.

'The sale of ebooks has slowed down in recent years. Some big publishers are even saying that ebook sales are falling. This has made people wonder if ebooks will replace print books. One person in the publishing industry said that the hype around ebooks might have led to bad decisions, and that their company lost confidence in the power of printed books. Despite this, many people still think that ebooks will replace print books. But the truth is that digital and print books can coexist. We still use both. This idea of one medium replacing another is not new. We've seen it with TV, radio, and the internet. People have always been worried that new technology will make old technology disappear. But usually, old technology finds new ways to stay popular.

We have a strong emotional connection to the things we use every day, like books, TVs, and computers. When a new technology comes along, it makes us think about what we used to have and what we're missing. This is why we often see a new appreciation for old things, like old books and their smell. We also like to tell stories about how technology changes our lives. We use stories to make sense of change. The story of the death of the book is a good example. It's a story that shows how we feel about new technology and how we're afraid of losing things that are important to us.'

Here is the simplified text for a learner of level B1:

For a year and a half, I woke up every weekday morning at 5:30. I brushed my teeth, made a cup of coffee, and sat down to write about how famous people throughout history managed their daily routines. I wanted to find out how they made time for their work, how they organized their days to be creative and productive. By looking at the daily habits of these people, I hoped to get a better understanding of their personalities and careers.

I believe that knowing what someone eats and when they eat can tell you a lot about who they are. I think that knowing someone's daily routine can also reveal a lot about their personality and work habits. This book is about the daily routines of famous and successful people, not just their final products. It's about how they managed their time, not just what they created.

I wrote this book because I struggle with the same issues in my own life. I want to know how to balance my creative work with my daily responsibilities. I want to know how to make time for everything I want to do. I don't have all the answers, but I hope to provide some examples of how other people have handled these challenges.

I wanted to show how big ideas can be broken down into small, daily tasks. I wanted to show how a person's daily routine can affect their work and vice versa. The title of my book is Daily Rituals, but I focused on people's daily routines. A routine can be ordinary and uninteresting, but it can also be a powerful tool for getting things done. A good routine can help you make the most of your time, energy, and optimism.

This book was inspired by my own procrastination. One day, I was supposed to write an article, but instead I spent the day tidying my office and making coffee. I started searching the internet for information on how other writers work. I found some interesting stories and decided to collect them in a blog. The blog was popular, and now I've turned it into a book.

I've tried to keep the book concise and diverse, with quotes from the people I'm writing about. I've also included a list of sources in the back of the book, so readers can learn more about the people and their routines.<|eot_id|>

Howard became interested in palaeontology when he was six years old. His family couldn't afford a holiday to Spain, so they went to the English coast instead. On the beach, Howard found an ammonite, a type of fossil. He knew he wanted to be a palaeontologist and, as he finished university, he decided he wanted to focus on the earliest times. He didn't like the flashy parts of the job, like dinosaurs, but he loved studying small creatures on rocks.

After completing his PhD, Howard worried about finding a job. He applied for a position at Tavistock College in London, but wasn't sure if he would get it. On the day of the interview, the professor who was supposed to chair the panel got into a fight with his wife and was late. The interview went ahead without him, and a colleague who didn't like Howard got him the job. Howard was surprised, but happy to have the job.

Howard found that his professional life was organized and predictable, but his personal life was chaotic. One day, his briefcase with important notes was stolen at a train station. He had to cancel a lecture and report the theft to the police. Later, he met a colleague who told him about a new collection of fossils at the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. This was an opportunity Howard couldn't miss, and he quickly changed his plans to visit the museum.<|eot_id|>

Charles Spence is a professor at Oxford University who studies how we experience food and drink. He thinks that the way we eat and drink is not just about the taste, but also about the surroundings and the company we keep. For example, eating with others can make us eat more. He has written a book about this called "The Perfect Meal".

Spence's lab is not high-tech, but he can still work with cooks and food companies to study how we eat. He gets funding from a big food company and has even worked with famous chefs like Heston Blumenthal. He has discovered some surprising things, like how music can affect what we taste. For example, higher-pitched music can make food taste sweeter, while lower-pitched music can make it taste bitter.

Spence's work is helping food companies make healthier food without changing the taste. He is also working with airlines to match music with food on planes. His family has fun trying out his experiments at home, like eating rabbit with the fur wrapped around the cutlery or playing with different sounds and lights while drinking different drinks.

Here is a rewritten version of the text at a level suitable for a B1 learner:

Our brains are working harder than ever before. We're bombarded with information, fake news, and distractions, and we have to sort through it all to find what we need. At the same time, we're doing more things ourselves. Thirty years ago, travel agents would book our flights and salespeople would help us find what we needed in stores. Now we do most things ourselves. We're doing the work of 10 people while still managing our daily lives, families, careers, hobbies, and TV shows. Our smartphones help us do all this, but there's a problem. We think we're multitasking, but our brains aren't good at it. We're actually switching between tasks quickly, which can be tiring for our brains. This can make us less efficient and even stressed.

In fact, research shows that multitasking can increase stress hormones and make it harder to focus. Our brains can get easily distracted, especially by new things. This means that the part of our brain that helps us focus can get sidetracked. Just being able to multitask can make us less good at thinking and learning.

Some experts call this "info-mania." They say that having too much information and trying to focus on one task while doing other things can reduce our intelligence by almost 10 points. Even trying to learn new things while multitasking can make it harder to remember and understand.

Making decisions is also hard on our brains. Even small decisions can take up a lot of mental energy, and too many decisions can make us tired and confused. We might even make bad decisions because of it.

Many business leaders, scientists, and writers agree that email is a big problem. It's not the email itself, but the huge amount of communication we receive. We feel like we have to respond to every email, but it's hard to do that and get anything else done.

Some animals, like chimps and bats, do things that seem like they are trying to help each other. For example, a chimpanzee named Santino in a Swedish zoo used to break up concrete to throw at visitors during the day. Was he being mean or helpful? Some animals, like female bats, help other mothers who are having trouble giving birth. Are they being kind or just doing their job? 

Fifty years ago, scientists thought animals just did things without feelings or thoughts. But now, scientists are studying animal behavior and emotions. They are even writing books about it. This has started a big debate: can animals really think and feel like humans do? 

A recent experiment with cows showed that they enjoy solving problems. If cows can open a gate to get food, they seem to be happy. This makes us think about where we get our food and whether it's right to eat animals. 

Some scientists say we should stop eating meat because animals have feelings and thoughts. Others say we should just learn more about animal behavior and not make assumptions. 

The debate is not just about science, but also about what is right and wrong. It's a big question that may never be fully answered.

'Thinking critically is important when we read or listen to something to understand it better. Adrian West, a researcher, says that people used to think that arguing was a way to find the truth. However, technology is changing the way we think. We are exposed to more information, but this can make it harder to think clearly. West says that we are often overwhelmed by too much information and opinions.

Reading is becoming less popular, and some people think this is affecting our ability to think critically. Patricia Greenfield, a professor, says that we are spending too much time on visual media like video games and TV, and not enough time reading. This can make it harder to think deeply and make good decisions.

Technology can be both good and bad for our thinking. For example, a computer game can help us think critically or make us think less critically. Reading on the internet can help us analyze information, but clicking on too many links can make it hard to think deeply.

James Paul Gee, a professor, says that video games can be a good tool for learning. They can help us develop important skills like decision-making and analysis. He believes that we should not think that video games are always bad for kids. In fact, they can be very helpful.

It's important to understand how technology affects our thinking and analysis. As reading and math scores are declining, we need to take a closer look at technology and how it affects our minds.'

Here is a simplified version of the text, adapted for a learner of level B1:

Matthew Crawford is a motorcycle mechanic who used to work in offices. He writes books about how we should live. His latest book is about the problems of modern life. He noticed that we're constantly being interrupted by advertisements and messages on our phones. This makes it hard for us to think and remember things. We're also less likely to talk to strangers because we're always trying to avoid distractions.

Crawford thinks that we're losing the ability to focus on what's important because we're too busy looking at our phones. He says that we're more aware of the things we could be doing, but we're not doing them because we're too busy staring at screens. This is not a new problem - people have been worried about it since the invention of the telegraph.

Crawford thinks that technology has made it easier for us to avoid dealing with real people and things. We'd rather send a text message to a friend instead of talking to them face-to-face. He gives the example of a gym where people used to listen to music together, but now everyone listens to their own music on headphones. This has made the gym a less social place.

Crawford suggests that we need to find ways to engage with the world in a more meaningful way. He thinks that doing things that require skill and attention, like cooking or playing sports, can help us do this. These activities force us to focus on the present moment and deal with the world around us. When we do this, we can see that manufactured experiences, like video games or social media, are not as satisfying as real experiences.

Crawford's solution is to find ways to use our judgment and pay attention to what's important. This can be tiring, but it makes it easier to focus on what matters.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text, suitable for a learner of level B1:

'What do you do for a living?' It's a common question, but it's not always easy to answer. When you're a philosopher, it's even harder. Saying you're a philosopher can sound pretentious, like you're trying to be special or superior to others. But this isn't true. Philosophers are just people who think deeply about the world and try to understand it. They're not better than anyone else.

The idea that philosophers are special comes from ancient Greece, where philosophers like Aristotle and Socrates were respected for their wisdom. They believed that thinking deeply about the world was the most important thing you could do. Today, people still think that philosophy is about being smart and thinking deeply, but it's not just that. It's about looking at the world in a new way and trying to understand it.

Some philosophers have become too focused on their own special ideas and don't talk to anyone else about them. This makes it hard for people to understand what philosophy is really about. But philosophy is actually very practical. It's about looking at the things we do every day and asking if they're really important. It's about thinking about what we believe and why we believe it.

As an ethicist, I study how we should behave and what is right and wrong. But I think there's more to philosophy than just making rules. I think it's about exploring big questions and thinking about how we live our lives. By doing this, we can learn more about ourselves and the world around us.

'Food is an important part of our lives, and many people enjoy thinking about what and how we eat. However, philosophers haven't always talked about food in a serious way. Instead, they have used food as a metaphor for other topics, like learning. Sometimes, they discuss food, but only to make a point about something else. 

One ancient Greek philosopher, Epicurus, believed in enjoying life and avoiding pain. He didn't just talk about food, but about all aspects of life. Today, his name is often associated with a love of eating and drinking, and even restaurants and food shops use it to make their products sound appealing.

Food is also a social and cultural thing. The food we eat comes from our community and is often shared with others. This is why food is an important topic for philosophers to explore. 

When people write about food, they often talk about how it tastes. But, surprisingly, there isn't much written about how we perceive the taste of food. This is an area that needs more attention. 

Food can also be beautiful, like art or music. Some people think that, with the rise of modern cooking, food has become an important part of aesthetic discussions. However, food is eaten and destroyed, unlike art, which can be preserved and admired over time. 

There are also many ethical questions about food, such as what we should eat and why. Philosophers will always ask these questions and explore the answers. 

Finally, food can bring people together, whether it's in a restaurant or at home. Home cooks have a special responsibility to their guests, while professional chefs have obligations to their employers and the food itself. Food can even help bridge cultural gaps by bringing people together to share meals and learn about each other's cultures.'<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text, suitable for a learner of English at level B1:

Rob Daviau, an American, designs special board games called 'legacy' games. He wanted to make games more exciting and challenging. He thought, 'Why can't games have a story? Why can't our choices affect the game in the next session?' He created a new version of a classic game called Risk, called Risk Legacy. In this game, players make permanent changes to the board. They might tear up cards, draw on the board, or open new rule packets. The game is played over several sessions, and players can see the results of their choices.

Daviau was asked to help create a legacy version of another popular game, Pandemic. Players work together to cure diseases. His next project was a game called SeaFall. Players become sailors and explore the world. Legacy game designers need to think about all the possible choices players can make to make the game exciting and fun.

To test the game, designers play it many times to see how it unfolds. One tester, Jaime Barriga, said it takes a lot of time and effort. 'You have to play the game many times to make sure it's fun and exciting.'

Daviau didn't expect legacy games to become popular. He thought it would be a niche idea. But many players loved the concept. One player, Russell Chapman, said it's the biggest advance in game design in years. 'It's exciting to learn new things and make new choices,' he said.

Another player, Ben Hogg, said the appeal of an unfolding adventure is more important than worrying about the game's longevity. 'It's like watching a TV series,' he said.

Pandemic creator Matt Leacock compared the legacy design process to writing a novel. 'You need to plan the beginning and end, but also be flexible,' he said. Daviau wants to see where others take the idea, but he's also excited to play the games himself.

Colby Dauch, a game publisher, thinks the legacy format has changed the way we think about board games. 'It's a new way to experience a game,' he said.<|eot_id|>

One night, an octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at a zoo in New Zealand. He climbed out of the water, crossed the floor, and squeezed into a small drain that led to the ocean. This story was shared online and was very popular. People enjoy imagining that animals are like us, and octopuses are especially interesting because they are very smart and have bodies that are very different from ours. How can octopuses open jars, recognize faces, and even play games? Some scientists think that we don't give animals enough credit for their intelligence. They say that we often think animals are not as smart as we are, but this is not true. Animals can do many things that we thought were unique to humans, such as thinking about the past and future, showing empathy, and understanding what others are thinking. Octopuses, for example, can solve problems and even play with toys.

In the past, people thought that animals were very intelligent and could be put on trial for crimes. Even Charles Darwin, the scientist who discovered evolution, believed that the difference between humans and animals is just a matter of degree, not kind. However, in the 20th century, some scientists thought that animals were just machines that responded to stimuli or had useful instincts. This changed how people thought about animals and how they treated them. Now, scientists are learning more about animal intelligence and how it is similar to human intelligence. They are designing tests that are specific to each species and its abilities. For example, squirrels can remember where they hide nuts, but they might struggle with human memory tests. An octopus might test humans on their ability to change color like an octopus does.

The story of Inky the octopus is a good example of how people are becoming more interested in animal intelligence. The scientist who wrote about Inky is skeptical about whether Inky really escaped on his own, but he thinks that the story can help people appreciate how smart octopuses are.<|eot_id|>

Experts say that robots will soon be used in many areas, including healthcare, education, and even our homes. This change will be big and will affect many jobs. Some people think that robots will take over many jobs, but experts say that this is not necessarily true. They believe that robots will create new jobs that require special skills, such as programming and maintenance.

A company in Australia has developed a robot that can lay bricks faster than a human. A robot in a supermarket in the US ensures that shelves are stocked and priced correctly. Robots are getting smarter and more efficient, and they will soon be able to work alongside humans.

Dr. Jing Bing Zhang, an expert on robotics, says that robots will have a big impact on the job market. He believes that many people will need to retrain to adapt to the changes. He also thinks that robots will create new opportunities for companies that are prepared to take advantage of this shift.

In the future, we can expect to see robots that can walk and talk like humans. This will change the way we live and work. It is important that we prepare for this change by investing in education, particularly in subjects like science, technology, engineering, and maths (STEM).'

'Why do people climb mountains?' This is a question that has puzzled many. Some people might think it's crazy to risk their lives to climb a big mountain. But for climbers, it's about the adventure and the fun. Climbing can be a way to challenge yourself and feel free. It's like playing a game with rules, and the way you play depends on the game. Some people love climbing because it makes them feel alive. But it can also be scary and confining at times. For example, being stuck in a tent during a storm is not very liberating.

Some people think that climbing is in our nature. We have always climbed and will always climb. It's a way to test our limits and push ourselves. Others believe that climbing helps us develop important qualities like courage, humility, and respect for nature. It can also help us develop virtues like perseverance and self-reliance.

Climbing can be done in different ways, and some people prefer to do it alone. They have to be very committed to their goal to succeed. This can be a big challenge, but it can also be very rewarding.

Climbing is not just about the physical activity, but also about being in the moment and feeling connected to nature. It's like a form of meditation. Some people even think that climbing can help us reach a state of perfect peace, like in Zen philosophy.

When we ask why people climb, we can consider all these different perspectives. It's a complex question, but it's an important one to explore.'<|eot_id|>

Brendel didn't teach many students, but he was impressed by a young boy named Kit Armstrong when he asked for lessons. Kit was only 14 years old, but he played the piano very well and even recorded a CD of his own music. Brendel was impressed by Kit's talent and agreed to teach him.

Kit is now 19 years old and is still learning from Brendel. He is a hard worker and likes to learn new things, such as languages, math, and computer programming. He also likes to play tennis and compose his own music. Brendel says that Kit has a great memory and can play the piano very well. He is also very good at listening to his own playing and can make changes to improve it.

Brendel is careful not to put too much pressure on Kit, as he doesn't want him to get too stressed. He says that Kit is still young and needs time to develop his skills. Brendel himself is now 80 years old and has stopped performing, but he still loves music and is happy to share his knowledge with Kit.

When I was a child, I thought all gardens were beautiful and peaceful. My grandfather's garden was special because it was near a river. You couldn't see the river, but you could hear the water and the birds singing. I thought all gardens were like this. My grandfather's garden wasn't very big or fancy.
